smart_goals.description: Maintain a daily sodium intake of no more than 2000mg for the next 30 days. Monitor daily sodium intake through food diary and limit salt usage.
Reduce A1C levels below 7.0 in the next 6 months. Monitor fasting blood glucose levels twice weekly and adjust insulin dosage accordingly.
Improve cholesterol levels in the next 3 months. Eat a heart-healthy diet, including 2 servings of fruits and 3 servings of vegetables daily. Monitor cholesterol levels every 4 weeks.
